name: hcibrain-monorepo
description: HCIBrain Paper Skimming Assistant - Complete Full-Stack Application

scripts.backend:dev: cd packages/backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn src.hci_extractor.web.app:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
scripts.backend:lint: cd packages/backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m ruff check src/
scripts.test: cd packages/backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m pytest tests/
scripts.python:complexity: radon cc packages/backend/src/ -s -n B && radon mi packages/backend/src/ -s -n B
scripts.quality:all: npm run python:format:check && npm run python:lint && npm run python:type-check && npm run python:security && npm run python:complexity && npm run python:test:cov

author: HCIBrain Team
